technical.focal_length: 85-135mm for minimal distortion, 50mm standard, macro lenses for detail shots
technical.depth_of_field: Variable - deep DOF for overall product clarity, shallow for hero shots and luxury items
technical.lighting: Controlled studio lighting with softboxes, diffusers, reflectors; key, fill, and rim lighting setup
technical.camera_format: Full-frame DSLR/mirrorless, medium format for high-end commercial work

aesthetic.composition: Clean, centered compositions; rule of thirds for lifestyle context; negative space emphasis
aesthetic.subject_background: Seamless white/gray backgrounds, or contextual environments that don't compete with product
aesthetic.tonal_range: High contrast with retained detail in highlights and shadows; even tonal distribution
aesthetic.color_approach: Accurate color reproduction; neutral backgrounds; brand-consistent color schemes
aesthetic.texture_detail: Sharp, detailed rendering of product textures; emphasis on material quality and craftsmanship

shooting_approach.subject_distance: Close enough to show product details clearly while maintaining context
shooting_approach.angle_perspective: Straight-on, 45-degree angles, overhead flat lays; multiple angles for comprehensive coverage
shooting_approach.subject_relationship: Formal, pristine presentation; products often isolated or in carefully staged contexts
shooting_approach.environment: Primarily controlled studio environments; occasional lifestyle settings for context

context.historical_context: Evolved from catalog photography in early 1900s; revolutionized by digital photography and e-commerce
context.key_characteristics: Clean presentation, accurate representation, consistent lighting, brand alignment

era_variants.notes: Evolution from formal catalog style to lifestyle integration; social media influence creating more casual, contextual approaches
